projects.title: Spotify Sessions
projects.subtitle: Contorl the Spotify queue with a web app and share this session with friends
projects.description: 10.07.2024: currently in development, not for public use. The Spotify users must me manuelly approved, as a policy of the Spotify API. The app is built with NextJS and FastAPI, and uses the Spotify API to control the queue. The frontend is styled with TailwindCSS and Flowbite. The app is hosted on GCP.

projects.title: Azubiwerk.us
projects.subtitle: EuroTeQ Collider
projects.description: Developed a community website using SvelteKit and Supabase. Facilitated communication and engagement among residents with features for event coordination, announcements, and resource sharing.

projects.title: Research Project Meinung
projects.subtitle: TUM: Junge Akademie
projects.description: Moral values are individually diverse and are expressed in a varied and massive way in news and media. Our goal is the development of a tool for analyzing and categorizing moral viewpoints on societal issues expressed in text form.

projects.title: HackaTUM 2023: TUM.services
projects.subtitle: ðŸŽ‰ Winning Project - Wildtrack
projects.description: tum.services is a web application that helps students to find the right courses and modules for their studies at TUM. It uses a recommendation system based on the student's preferences and the courses' content.

projects.title: HackaTUM 2022: Wordless
projects.subtitle: ðŸŽ‰ Winning Project - Wildtrack
projects.description: We transcribe TUM live lectures, offer keyword search, and provide subtitles in multiple languages, making education more accessible and inclusive.

projects.title: CarbonDiet
projects.subtitle: START Hack St. Gallen 2023
projects.description: CarbonDiet is a mobile application that uses image recognition and AI technology to scan grocery shopping receipts, allowing users to calculate their carbon footprint. Part of the Google Cloud Challenge.

projects.title: CHECK24 GenDen holiday challange
projects.subtitle: CHECK24 Challange
projects.description: This project is part of the CHECK24 GenDev Holiday Challenge. The app is built with a SvelteKit frontend, a FastAPI backend interfaced with a PostgreSQL database, and also incorporates a Redis cache for performance enhancement.

projects.title: openLYKE
projects.subtitle: JA Sciene Hack 2023
projects.description: openLYKE, an open and transparent social media platform that puts you in control. With openLYKE, you can connect with others, share your thoughts, and engage in meaningful conversations while having full control over your data and privacy.

projects.title: knothe.me - Personal Website
projects.subtitle: personal project
projects.description: The personal website. Designed and coded by myself. In the forontend/backend SvelteKit, styling with Flowbite and TailwindCSS.
